title: How Elon Musk Became a Geopolitical Chaos Agent
description: The world’s richest man has inserted himself in some of the world’s most combustible conflicts.
dc:creator: Cade Metz, Adam Satariano and Chang Che
media:description: Elon Musk, center, met the Chinese Premier Li Keqiang in Beijing in 2019. Mr. Musk has been criticized for statements regarding China’s interest in Taiwan.
